Vous devez d'abord lancer %empire_mode% afin de créer un joueur.
%free_mode% est verrouillé jusqu'à ce que vous ayez joué à %empire_mode%. Cliquez sur %empire_mode% pour commencer Chocolatier.
La machinerie est en pause. Appuyez sur %ok% pour revenir au mini-jeu.
Impossible de changer de mode d'écran !
Afficher automatiquement les boîtes de dialogue d'aide
Ce nom est déjà pris. Veuillez saisir un nom unique pour votre partie sauvegardée.
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer le joueur nommé %1% ?

Oh-oh ! Ingrédient gaspillé !

Assurez-vous que vous tirez un ingrédient nécessaire sur le plateau. Utilisez le modèle de recette vert à droite comme guide.

Si vous gaspillez 8 ingrédients, je serai obligé d'arrêter la production...
Cliquez sur un chocolat pour afficher sa page dans le livre de recettes.
Cliquez sur un chocolat pour afficher sa page dans le livre de recettes.
Barres succulentes et luxueuses faites avec les meilleurs chocolats accentués dans une grande variété de saveurs.
Parfaites pour les cadeaux et les occasions spéciales, ces gâteries gourmandes ne seront pas oubliées de sitôt.
Des centres de ganache crémeux de style européen dans une gamme d'épices exotiques, de fruits et de noix qui fondent simplement dans la bouche.
Des concoctions classiques, créées en mélangeant les meilleurs ingrédients dans des boules crémeuses et divines de pur bonheur.

Bienvenue, Chocolatier ! Votre objectif en Mode Empire est de devenir Maître Chocolatier. Pour atteindre ce rang, vous devez amasser une fortune d'au moins 10 000 000 $. Posséder les six usines du jeu, chacune produisant des confiseries haut de gamme, vous aidera à atteindre votre objectif. Avez-vous ce qu'il faut pour conquérir le monde grâce au chocolat ?
Personnalisez les panneaux qui apparaissent sur vos usines à travers le monde.
xxxx DIALOGUE ET TEXTE POPUP xxxx
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir quitter Chocolatier ?
Tu ne peux pas te le permettre.
Ce port peut être ouvert en mode histoire.
Vu pour la dernière fois à %1% pour %2%/sack
Vous ne possédez pas cette recette particulière. Ça a l'air délicieux, n'est-ce pas ? Et il doit certainement être quelque part là-bas, attendant juste d'être découvert...
Je vous souhaite bonne chance dans votre quête pour devenir un Maître Chocolatier !
Wow, <joueur> ! Vous êtes en train de vous faire un sacré nom !
J'aimerais que vous en ayez autant, <player>. Mais je vais prendre tout ce que tu as !
Je serais heureux d'acheter vos confections, mais il semble que vous n'en ayez pas sous la main en ce moment. Reviens me voir quand tu auras quelque chose à vendre.
Félicitations, vous avez vendu votre premier %1% Vous avez vendu un lot de %1%. Il semble que la demande soit en baisse.!
You have sold a lot of %1%. It looks like demand may be waning.
La demande pour %1% semble assez faible en ce moment.
%1% ne semblent plus très bien se vendre. Le marché peut se jouer.
Vous n'avez pas assez d'argent en main pour effectuer cet achat...

Certaines des recettes les plus sophistiquées nécessitent du cacao variétal. Nous cultivons et fermentons uniquement les meilleurs <item> ici. À <price> un sac, pas une mauvaise affaire. Combien de sacs souhaitez-vous ?

Cette usine faisait autrefois partie du grand empire Baumeister Confections. Ces derniers temps, il a connu des moments difficiles, et je cherche un nouveau propriétaire pour en profiter au maximum. Il peut être à vous pour seulement <price>. Souhaitez-vous l'acheter?
Il s'agit d'une ancienne usine Baumeister Confections. Je serais prêt à vous le vendre pour <price>. Revenez me voir dès que vous aurez l'argent pour l'acheter.
Nous n'avons pas les ingrédients pour faire cette recette.
La recette avec laquelle nous travaillons nécessite :
Vous avez équipé cette usine pour :
Pour faire <product> ici, nous aurons besoin d'une machine qui fait du <type>. Les coûts de machine requis : <price>. Voulez-vous acheter cette machine pour cette usine maintenant ?
Cette recette nécessite une machine pour <type>, et nous n'en avons pas dans cette usine. La machine coûte <price>, ce qui est un peu hors de notre budget en ce moment !

Afin de lancer les machines pour commencer à travailler sur cette recette, nous aurons besoin d'avoir tous les ingrédients nécessaires à portée de main. Les ingrédients suivants sont encore nécessaires :

Visez et cliquez pour tirer les ingrédients.
Faites correspondre le modèle de recette que vous voyez sur la droite.

J'accélérerai les machines au fur et à mesure que vous réussirez.
Déchets d'ingrédients, et je' Je vais ralentir les choses.
Waste 8, et je serai obligé d'arrêter la production.
Bonne chance !

Pas trop minable, là, patron.

Plus vous ferez de caisses de chocolats ici, plus nous pourrons en fabriquer chaque semaine, et plus vite vous verrez vos bénéfices grimper...

Bravo, patron !

N'oubliez pas que plus nous produisons de caisses de chocolats chaque semaine, plus nous pouvons gagner d'argent !

Wow, vous avez vraiment un moyen avec ces machines !

Gardez simplement les ingrédients à portée de main, et nous continuerons à préparer les caisses au rythme que vous venez d'établir.

Yowza !

Je n'arrive pas à croire le nombre de recettes que vous venez de préparer ! Vous êtes vraiment un chocolatier doué...

Whoa !

Les ingrédients volaient partout, j'ai donc dû éteindre les choses pour nettoyer et recalibrer.

N'oubliez pas de faire correspondre le modèle de recette vert sur la droite.

Not too shabby, boss.

The more cases of chocolates you make here, the more we'll be able to make each week, and the faster you'll see your profits climb...

Nice job, boss!

Remember, the more cases of chocolates we produce each week, the more money we can make!

Wow, you have really got a way with those machines!

Just keep the ingredients on hand, and we'll keep cranking out the cases at the rate you just established.

Yowza!

I can't believe how many of that recipe you just cranked out! You are truly a gifted chocolate-maker...

Whoa!

Ingredients were flying everywhere, so I had to shut things down to clean up and recalibrate.

Remember to match the green recipe template on the right.

That was OK, but I believe that you can do better.

The more cases of chocolates you make in there, the more we'll be able to make each week, and the faster you'll see your profits climb.

Way to go in there!

Remember, the more cases of chocolates we produce each week, the more money we can make!

Impressive! Now that's the way to get the job done!

Just keep the ingredients on hand, and we'll keep cranking out the cases at the rate you just established.

That was unbelievable!

I can't remember the last time I saw someone produce that many of that recipe you just made! You are truly a gifted chocolate-maker.

Oh no!

Ingredients were flying everywhere, so I had to shut things down to clean up and recalibrate.

Remember to match the green recipe template on the right.

I guess that was OK in terms of production.

Keep in mind that the more cases of chocolates you make here, the more we'll be able to make each week, and the faster you'll see your profits climb.

Not bad, not bad at all!

Remember, the more cases of chocolates we produce each week, the more money we can make!

Excellent work. You seem very sure of yourself in there!

You keep the ingredients on hand, and we'll keep cranking out the cases at the rate you just established.

Now that was some serious chocolate-making!

You are an extremely talented chocolate-maker.

Hold on!

Ingredients were flying everywhere, so I had to shut things down to clean up and recalibrate.

Remember to match the green recipe template on the right.

Well, that was a so-so production run.

The more cases of chocolates you make here, the more we'll be able to make each week, and the faster you'll see your profits climb.

Way to go in there!

Remember, the more cases of chocolates we produce each week, the more money we can make!

Terrific work in there!

Just keep the ingredients on hand, and we'll keep cranking out the cases at the rate you just established.

Good gracious, that was awesome!

I can't believe how many of that recipe you just cranked out! You are the stuff legends are made of...

Whoops!

Ingredients were flying everywhere, so I had to shut things down to clean up and recalibrate.

Remember to match the green recipe template on the right.

That was a decent showing in the factory. I'd be surprised if you couldn't do a bit better in there.

The more cases of chocolates you make here, the more we'll be able to make each week, and the faster you'll see your profits climb.

Not too bad in there, indeed.

Remember, the more cases of chocolates we produce each week, the more money we can make!

Smashing job in the factory, darling!

Now just keep the ingredients on hand, and we'll keep cranking out the cases at the rate you just established.

That was simply extraordinary chocolate-making!!

That was an incredible number of cases of that recipe you just produced!

Yikes!

Ingredients were flying everywhere, so I had to shut things down to clean up and recalibrate.

Remember to match the green recipe template on the right.

I say, that was all right, I reckon.

The more cases of chocolates you make here, the more we'll be able to make each week, and the faster you'll see your profits climb.

A fine job indeed!

Remember, the more cases of chocolates we produce each week, the more money we can make!

Bravo! I say, you certainly know how to handle yourself in a chocolate factory, don't you?

Just keep the ingredients on hand, and we'll keep cranking out the cases at the rate you just established.

My word!

That was a most remarkable number of cases of that recipe that you just cranked out! You can make chocolates with the best I've ever seen.

Wait a minute!

Ingredients were flying everywhere, so I had to shut things down to clean up and recalibrate.

Remember to match the green recipe template on the right.

Salut, compagnon de route. J'aimerais vous proposer un pari - dirons-nous  ? Le lancer le plus élevé gagne.

Vous avez de la chance ?
Je n'aime pas ce regard dans tes yeux. Retrouve-moi quand tu es sûr de pouvoir couvrir tes paris !
Ai-je dit n'importe lequel pari? Eh bien... je ne veux pas te laisser sans le sou...
Bah, ne me fais pas perdre mon temps !
C'est un match nul ! Je suppose que nous pouvons tous les deux garder notre argent.
Vous gagnez! Ici, prenez vos gains et partez.
Je gagne! Je te souhaite plus de chance la prochaine fois.
Presented to those Chocolatiers who show incredible promise, and who have achieved the Rank of %rank_1%.
Given to those Chocolatiers who achieve the Rank of %rank_2%.
Accorded to those Chocolatiers who achieve the Rank of %rank_3%.
Bestowed upon those Chocolatiers who achieve the Rank of %rank_4%.
The International Society of Confectioners is pleased to bestow upon you the
Given to those Chocolatiers who have collected at least 5 recipes for Chocolate Bars.
Presented to those Chocolatiers who have collected at least 10 recipes for Chocolate Squares.
Granted to those Chocolatiers who have collected at least 12 recipes for Chocolate Infusions.
Conferred upon those Chocolatiers who have collected at least 14 recipes for Chocolate Truffles.
Presented to those Chocolatiers who have expanded their operations by purchasing their first Chocolate Shop.
Presented to those Chocolatiers who have taken over all 6 factories.
Presented to those Chocolatiers who have visited all ports in the world.

You achieved the rank of %rank_4% in weeks with a grand total of . This represents earnings of per week, and this is your final score.
You may continue to grow your chocolate empire, or create a new player and try to get to %rank_4% with a higher score!
I'm already offering you the lowest prices in all of <portName>!
Please, you must realize these ingredients are not easy to come by. Are my prices not fair?
Are you kidding? My own mother just purchased some ingredients from me at a higher price!
My brother told me this very morning: "<vendor>, remember what happened last time you lowered your prices? You had to sell the shirt from your back in order to feed your family."
Check the quality of these goods and you'll see they're worth the price. I only buy from the finest producers.
Look. These are my prices. I think you will find they are fair.
I am not of a mind to negotiate with you right now. My prices are firm.
Listen. You know what it's like here in <portName>. I have a family to feed too, you know.
You and I both know that these are extremely fair prices for the quality you find here in my Market.
I suppose I could shave a bit off these prices. What do you think?
You drive a hard bargain, and I'd like to keep you as a regular customer. How do these prices look?
For you, my friend, I can make a very special offer.
Okay, okay. I can lower my prices a bit, but my children will go hungry tonight!
If I say this out loud the other vendors here will be angry... so I'm going to write some new prices on this piece of paper. What do you think?
I am interested in making a sale here. I guess I can do something.
I don't normally do this, but I'm in a wonderful mood today. How do these prices look to you?
I can give you a break this time, but don't be expecting this kind of treatment every time you come by...
Wow! You drive a hard bargain. I won't make a dime at these prices; I hope you're happy.
Of course I can do something for you, such a special customer.
How dare you insult me so! Mine are the finest goods available. If anything, they should command the highest prices possible! Now pay or be gone.
Why can you not be happy with my already low and very fair prices? Well... you lost your chance to be reasonable, my friend. Check out these prices!
Perhaps you do not understand... I can charge whatever I feel is appropriate. Now, either buy from me at these prices or be gone from .
I grow tired of your company. Either make a purchase or be off!
I just heard from a trusted friend that my recent order will be late. I'm afraid I'll have to raise my prices.
Enough is enough. Now pay or be gone.
Now you have gone too far. How do you like these prices?
You have tried my patience. My prices are now going up.
You've got me thinking all right. I think my prices are too low. I am afraid I am going to raise them.
Maybe next time you'll recognize a good deal when you see one. For now, my prices have just gone up.
Smell the spices of the market! The quality here is top-notch. Try a sample!
I source my goods locally so they are as fresh as possible. What you see here just arrived this morning.
Your products will be the best they can be if you buy your ingredients from me!
Look closely, friend, and you'll see the finest quality available anywhere.
My family has sold goods in this market for generations, and we have reached near perfect quality in our goods.
It is not everywhere you will find goods as fresh as these, my friend.
All good products start with good ingredients.
Trust me, you can search far and wide and not find ingredients this fresh at prices this reasonable.
In for a bit of haggling are we? What can I do for you?
It is not easy to keep such wonderful ingredients in stock for my customers...
Wow! Your prices are amazingly reasonable.
How can you afford to offer such great products at such low prices?
I have never seen such quality ingredients.
Thank you for allowing me to peruse your goods.
I'm very impressed with your stock.
I wish you all the best in your endeavors.
Good luck to you, and thank you for operating such a lovely market.
I will be back to buy from you soon!
Might you be able to make me a deal?
My, isn't this a lovely day.
It seems to me that prices have gone up lately, don't you think so?
Your prices seem just a little bit high to me...
I'm ready to buy, as long as the price is right.
I recall seeing some of these items for less in other ports...
Might there be some flexibility in your prices?
I understand that there's no such thing as a fixed price in this town?
Look, I don't want to waste your time. Can you offer me a better price?
Can you see your way to giving me a bit of a discount?
I'm not sure I can afford everything I need here...
Please help me spend my money here, and not somewhere else.
I may need to think about this purchase some more.
Any chance of you coming down on your prices?
Boy I sure would like to buy some things from you right now.
Hmmmm. I don't know. I do want some things, but....
I guess I may need to come back at another time.
How interested are you in selling ingredients to me?
Look. I want you to give me a better deal here.
I don't want to waste any more of your time.
Can't you do something for me here?
You are ripping me off here!
Your prices are insane - are you trying to make me broke?
You're not serious about these prices, are you?
Boy oh boy, you do have some lovely looking ingredients here...
I might be interesting in buying more ingredients, if the price were right...
How about giving me a better deal today?
Wow, your goods seem rather spendy to me today.
Might you see your way to offering me a break here?
Are you joking? I've seen better prices all over the world!
I will not buy from you at your current prices.
Unless you lower your prices, I will take my business elsewhere.
Can't you do anything for me here?
Wow. Your ingredients smell absolutely wonderful!
If you do something for me today, I will be sure to shop here again.
What do you say we talk about your real prices for a minute.
Hey, I'm not a tourist, I'm trying to do some business here.
I detect a fair amount of markup in your current prices...
Hey fellow traveler, I heard some news that may be useful to you: %1%
I heard this through the grapevine: %1%
%1% Just don't go blabbing it around and we'll both do fine!
Greetings, friend. Know what? %1% Keep it under your hat...
Valentine's Day is fast approaching. Romantics around the world are giving chocolate prices a boost!
Easter is just around the corner, and the bunny is driving up demand for your chocolates!
Trick-or-Treaters need more treats! Halloween will be here before you know it. Chocolate prices will be up across the board!
Sales of chocolate gifts will be pushing up prices through the year-end holiday season.
When you least expect it, expect it!
Have you checked in on all of your factories lately? I'd hate for something to go wrong with one of them and stop production...
What a wonderful day for chocolate!
Every day is sweet, if chocolate is part of your day.
I've heard it said that Napoleon carried chocolate with him on his military campaigns. Sounds like my kind of army.
The first chocolate factory was established in Massachusetts Bay Colony in 1765. Of course, they didn't have any of our modern conveniences, like steam.

Christopher Columbus was introduced to the wonders of %cacao% during his 4th voyage, in 1502.

By 1503, I'll bet he was a full-blown chocoholic.
%cacao% only grow between 20 degrees North and 20 degrees South of the Equator. Picky little buggers.
I have yet to meet a case of chocolates I didn't like.
Nobody knows the truffles I've seen.
Hello, <player>. I believe I may have sampled some of your wares recently. Mighty impressive indeed!
Without fermentation cacao beans yield little or no chocolate flavor. And without chocolate flavor, what's the point, really?
Mark my words: One of these days science will prove unequivocally that quality chocolate is good for your health.
Mayan and Aztec Indians viewed chocolate as a symbol of power. Personally, I view it as something really delicious to eat.

In 1828 Coenraad Johannes van Houten, a Dutch Chocolatier, invented the cocoa press.
Three cheers for Coenraad!
No Coenraad, no cocoa butter.
There is nothing like a good case of chocolates to help one unwind after a long journey.

The first chocolate factory was established in Massachusetts Bay Colony in 1765.

I guess even the Puritans enjoyed a good bar of chocolate.
Life is uncertain. My suggestion to you is that you eat some good chocolates while you can.
Too bad Louis XIV of France is no longer around. You could have applied to be the Royal Chocolate Maker to the King.
A chocolate infusion each day keeps the doctor away.
I thought about trying to give up chocolate once, but then I thought better of it.
Be sure to poke around in each port that you visit -- you never know what the residents may be up to and what adventures and opportunities await you.
Prices at each market fluctuate based on local supply and demand, season, tastes and special conditions.
If you haggle too hard or too much, you may anger a merchant and see their prices skyrocket!
Prices at Chocolate Shops are firm and are determined by local market conditions, season, tastes and special situations.
Shops that you own will always offer you premium pricing for your chocolates.
Keep your products novel and prices will remain high. Bore your customers and you may see your profits take a dive.

Make chocolates as often as you like, but keep in mind that each factory run takes up a week that you could spend sourcing new ingredients, selling confections, and charting new paths for your business...
Be careful, <player>. Not everyone around here is to be trusted.
I've heard good things about your latest creations, <player>. Keep up the good work!
I have a hard time trusting people who don't appreciate fine chocolates.
I do come across old recipes from time to time, here at the library. Be sure to call on me next time you're in New York - one never knows...
Chocolate is said to date back more than 4,000 years, to the culture of the Mayas, who built what was once a marvelous city on this site.
A sunny day, a beautiful Plaza, what more could a man ask for in this world?
I am a naturalist, who gets to spend her days showing off the wonders of the Galapagos Islands. My uncle was in chocolate game, and I do have an eye out for recipes...
I am the youngest Baumeister, and my only desire is for my sisters to get along. Of course, I do love fine chocolates, but I guess that's part of being a Baumeister.
I have two passions: science and chocolate. Out in the Amazon, I get to indulge them both.
Legend has it this tower was built by a Sultan to protect his daughter, whom it was prophesized would die on her 18th birthday.
Keep up the good work, <player>. You would make my father proud!
Yes, I was in love with %sftutor%. Still am, I guess, in many ways...
Spent $200 on a Special Ticket that will be redeemed for a free trip.
Enter a name for your company...
Now, select a background for your sign...
An eye-catching logo will attract customers and make their mouths water...
Finally, color, style and position your company's name on your sign...
Excellent! Press "%done%" and your sign will appear on all factories you own throughout the world. To make changes later, simply click on any of your signs.
You do not have enough money to leave this port, and you have nothing on hand to sell. Do you want to continue playing?
Travel the world in search of recipes and ingredients at the best possible prices, manufacture and sell your chocolates for the highest profit, and strive to reach the coveted rank of %rank_4%!

In %empire_mode% you will meet friends (and maybe make a few enemies) as you complete adventures, collect recipes, discover new places, and unravel the story of the Baumeister family on your journey to become a %rank_4%.
Choose %free_mode% to set your own goals, play at your own pace, and explore the world unlocked through your %empire_mode% play.
Your map shows an overview of your chocolate empire, marking the ports you can visit with icons that give you valuable information.

Green pins mark ports you have visited.
A green circle marks your current location.
Flashing pins mark newly opened ports.
Closed ports open to you as you achieve higher ranks.

Other icons mark your shops and factories.
Steam rises from operational factories.
Stalled factories appear red - check your ingredient supply!
The shelf above the map holds the trophies you can earn while playing %empire_mode%.
Roll over a port icon for the cost and time of travel to your destination.
You will find a wide variety of buildings and places to visit in every port of the world. Interesting characters can often be found in each and every one.
While in a port, click on the buildings to visit and speak with the people who live, work, and relax there.
New ports, full of new people to meet and places to see, become available as you successfully complete quests and reach higher ranks in %empire_mode%.
You'll find most of the ingredients you need in markets around the world. Your purchases will be transported automatically back to your factories.
In a market, the receipt on the left shows the total you will spend when you press any green "%buy%" button.
Click on ingredient sacks and key desired quantities into the cash register. When you are ready, click the green "%buy%" button to complete your purchase.
Haggling may get you a lower price, but it may sometimes make people angry.
Sell your chocolates in shops around the world. Vary the products you sell or prices for those products may take a dip.
In a shop, the receipt on the left shows the total you will receive when you press any green "%sell%" button.

Click on chocolate platters and key quantities to sell into the cash register, or use the "%max%" button to enter your entire stock of that product. Use the green "%sell%" button to complete the sale.
As a shortcut, click "%sell_all%" to sell your entire product inventory at once.
Your factories manufacture chocolate products for you to sell. Configure them once, supply the ingredients, and let them run while you travel the world.
Click "%reconfigure%" to choose a product to manufacture from the recipes you know. You may have to purchase additional machinery or ingredients before starting the factory.

Click "%minigame%" to make chocolates and also set ongoing efficiency for that particular factory. The factory will continue to make chocolates at the rate you've established until you return and change it.
Fire ingredients from the conveyor belt into the trays to match the green recipe template and make as many chocolates as you can in one minute.

The green template on the right shows how full trays look for the recipe you selected. Ingredients that hit the tray snap into the correct slot. The machine turns full trays into chocolates as they pass by.

Ingredients enter the factory on the conveyor belt.
Aim the ingredients using your mouse.
Click to fire ingredients at the trays.
The machinery speeds up as you fill trays.
The machinery slows down when your ingredients miss.
Waste eight ingredients and the machinery will stop completely.
After you click "%start%" you have one minute to make chocolates and must see it through to the end.
Once configured, the factory will continue making chocolates as long as it has enough ingredients.
As you travel the world, you will meet many characters in saloons, farms, parks, and landmarks as well as on the high seas and railway lines.
Characters you meet will offer to share information, often for a price. Trade for new recipes, play games of chance, and learn tips about events that may affect supply or demand.
In %empire_mode% you will also be offered adventures and quests as you unravel the history of Baumeister Confections and try to reconcile the estranged members of this once-influential family.
The Ledger at the bottom of the screen puts the vital statistics of your chocolate empire at your fingertips.
The Messages tab shows a running history of key events and the To-Do's for your current quest.
The Inventory tab displays all of the ingredients and finished products you have in storage.
The Factory Status tab shows the status of your chocolate factories, including estimates based on current inventory levels and production rates.
The Recipe Book displays all of the Baumeister family recipes, organized by type of chocolate. Collect recipes to expand your chocolate empire!
A white question mark indicates a recipe you have yet to collect.
New recipes sparkle when they first appear.
Golden highlights accent each recipe that you have manufactured.
The tabs allow you to see the recipes for each particular type of chocolate. To make each type of chocolate, you will have to purchase the correct machinery for each of your factories.
Your <port> factory has produced <count> cases of <item>.
Set the <port> factory to manufacture cases of <product>
Adjusted the <port> factory to make <rate> cases of <product> per week
The port of <name> is now available.
Congratulations, you have been promoted to %1%.
Bought %1% sacks of %2% for %4% each at %5%.
Sold %1% cases of %2% for %4% each at %5%.
Your inventory of %1% is deteriorating in storage.
xxxx PRODUITS ET TYPES DE PRODUITS xxxx
Simple chocolate bars that are simply delicious.
A rich and creamy blend of fine milk solids, cacao and sugar.
Higher cacao content makes these a bit fancier than Basic Chocolate Bars.
The finest Quito cacao lends these bars a unique taste that lingers on the palate.
Cacao beans imported from %trinidad% give these bars their distinct, incomparable temper and taste.
Only the finest Mahajanga cacao harvested in Madagascar is used to craft these dark, delectable bars.
Sri Lankan cacao beans give these bars a wonderful aroma and remarkable finish.
Made with Sulawesi cacao, known among chocolate aficionados throughout the world for its subtle, earthy flavors.
Blending milk solids, sugar and cacao, these untraditional bars have become popular the world over.
These Extra Dark Chocolate Bars are made with 75%% pure cacao.
Fresh roasted almonds on a bed of the finest chocolate.
These scrumptious bars are made with roasted cashews, sugar and cacao beans.
Fresh lemons from Trinidad provide an intense burst of tangy, sweet flavor.
Sharp mint gives these bars a wonderful aftertaste. The perfect after-dinner chocolate.
Dense chocolate with real roasted coffee you will savor at the finish.
The snap of these sleek, extra dark and nutty bars is beyond compare.
High cacao content combined with roasted coffee beans make these bars a pleasure to see, smell and taste.
The finest extra dark chocolate shaped into squares.
Fresh cshews, encased in rich, dark chocolate, shaped into squares.
These squares are made with fresh almonds, and exhibit a nutty, earthy finish.
Roasted hazelnuts in creamy, smooth milk chocolate, fashioned into squares.
One luscious, sweet cherry surrounded by the finest chocolate.
Dark chocolate squares with a sweet cinnamon flare that evokes warmth and good cheer.
Light and buttery caramel centers enrobed in pure, dark chocolate.
A whole, toasted hazelnut awaits in these squares of the finest dark chocolate.
Rich, coffee-flavored chocolate squares are perfect for entertaining.
Fragrant fresh mint is the key to these delightful after-dinner chocolate squares.
Dark chocolate enrobes a crisp nougat of roasted almonds.
A hint of vanilla kisses a fresh cherry in these luscious chocolate squares.
A wisp of Madagascar vanilla, combined with cinnamon, give these squares a uniquely satisfying flavor and hue.
Creamy milk chocolate squares with a surprising whiff of vanilla.
Rich chocolate-encased fresh roasted hazelnuts, with a hint of vanilla, make these squares hard to resist.
Roasted almonds, creamy chocolate and the finest vanilla - delicious!
Velvety milk chocolate filling in a pure milk chocolate shell.
Ganache of roasted almonds accented by the finest vanilla, surrounded by the finest chocolate comprise these delectable infusions.
Rich, smooth chocolate infused with fresh coconut ganache.
Rich chocolate surrounds a tangy cherry ganache.
The finest chocolate encases a sweet, fresh lemon ganache.
Strong, dark coffee liquor enrobed in subtle, sublime chocolate.
Fresh cinnamon lends these delightful infusions a long, slow finish and lasting aftertaste.
Using only the freshest raspberries are the secret to these wonderful infusions.
Sharp mint gives these infusions a wonderful extra zing at the finish.
Exclusive Mahajanga chocolate surrounds a tangy cherry-infused ganache.
Coffee liquor wrapped in a chocolate shell made from exclusive Quito cacao.
Dark chocolate made with a varietal cacao from Sri Lanka encases a tart, fresh raspberry ganache.
Coffee and almond-infused ganache, surrounded by a chocolate shell from the finest Sri Lankan cacao.
Exclusive Mahajanga cacao chocolate encases a raspberry ganache filling with a breath of fresh mint.
The finest chocolate shell fashioned exclusively from Sulawesi cacao around a crunchy macadamia nut ganache filling.
A chocolate case from a secret blend of varietal beans from Sulawesi, Trinidad and Mahajanga enrobes a succulent vanilla filling.
A creamy milk chocolate filling, a milk chocolate shell, dusted with truffle powder: simple pleasure.
Fresh mint cream filling in a subtle chocolate shell, dusted with truffle powder.
Rich, dark chocolate filling in a dark chocolate case, dusted with truffle powder.
Roasted almond filling in a dark chocolate case, dusted with truffle powder.
Silky smooth caramel filling in a chocolate case, dusted with truffle powder.
A delightful paste bursting with hints of coconut and lemon, inside a delicious chocolate shell.
Truffles filled with a wonderful nougat swirling with coffee and cinnamon, perfect to warm any heart.
Crunchy, roasted whole hazelnuts enrobed in creamy milk chocolate, dusted with truffle powder.
Mahajanga cacao is the secret to these scrumptious truffles with a spicy cinnamon and sweet cherry-flavored filling.
Cacao from Sulawesi provides a unique temper to these truffles, filled with lemon macadamia liquor, dusted with truffle powder.
Distinctive Colombo cacao lends these truffles a inimitable finish. Their filling is a blend of coffee and caramel.
Trinidadian cacao and a cream filling made from roasted almonds with a touch of vanilla make these truffles one of a kind.
A blend of cacao beans from Trinidad and Colombo, combined with a creamy mint coffee inside makes these truffles famous.
Fresh raspberry, coconut and a blend of cacaos from Sulawesi and Mahajanga make these truffles impossible to forget.
The world's finest milk chocolate is made by combining exclusive stock cacaos from Colombo, Sulawesi and Quito.
Extra Dark Limited Stock Blended Cacao Truffles
A unique blend of cacaos from Colombo, Mahajanga, Trinidad and Sulawesi is used to make these extra dark, extra delicious truffles.
Pour vous voir proposer et accepter des quêtes, vous devez jouer à %empire_mode%.
Vous n'êtes pas en pleine quête ? Cliquez sur "Messages" ci-dessous et passez en revue le texte blanc de la tâche à faire qui explique ce que vous devez faire pour terminer la quête...

Greetings, . I am so glad that you are here to restore honor to the recipes of my family. You have a noble, but challenging task ahead of you.

Shall I help you get started?

Terrific!

Making fine chocolate - 'the elixir of the gods' - is a delicate art. You'll be making chocolates in no time, but first we need to cover some basics...

Take a look at your cash balance, on the left below. $0 - not good. I'm going to give you one case of chocolates to sell to %sfshopkeep% at %sfshop%.

By the way, while on a quest, your to-do's will appear in the Messages window below...

You have chocolates from %sftutor%? Did you know that she was a famous Chocolatier herself? If not for that sister of hers...

Well, go on inside to review what I am willing to pay for your goods. For now, click "%sell_all%" to complete the transaction.
Click %sell_all% to sell your chocolates to %sfshopkeep%.
You need to click %sell_all% in order to sell me your goods.

Thank you so much, <player>. Do visit again - I'm always interested in buying high quality chocolates for my shop.
Now, go back and speak with Evangeline at %sftutorplace%.

Success!

Did you notice the dramatic increase in your net worth, ? So, what shall we do with all that money burning a hole in your virtual pocket? Use it to make chocolates, of course!

There are three keys to making chocolates around here:

1) Recipes 2) Ingredients 3) Making chocolates

We'll take them one at a time...

Recipes

Your recipes determine what confections your factories can produce. Go meet %sfsalooner% at %sfsaloon%. Tell him I sent you for your first recipe...

Evangeline sent you for a recipe? You must be her latest project, yes? Enlisted you to help with the family squabble, did she? Well, she's nothing if not passionate, that woman.

Anyhow, here's a recipe for %basebars%. It should get you off to a fine start...
Go back and speak with %sftutor% at %sftutorplace%.

Congratulations - you've acquired your first recipe! Your Recipe Book shows which recipes you own, whether or not you have the ingredients on hand to make them, and which recipes you have yet to discover.

Did you notice that you do not have the ingredients you need to make %basebars%?

%sugar% can be found just about anywhere - head over to %sfmarket% here in town and purchase 50 sacks.
I need you to go to %sfmarket% and purchase 50 sacks of %sugar%.
I stock only the finest %sugar% here in my market. Step inside, enter the quantity you want, and click %ok_lower% to complete the purchase.
Enter 50 sacks of %sugar%, and click %ok_lower% to purchase.
You need to buy 50 sacks of sugar. Remember to click %ok_lower% to complete the purchase.

My prices, of course, include automatic transport of the ingredients you bought to wherever they are needed.

Now, head back to %sftutorplace% to speak with %sftutor%.
Go back and speak with %sftutor% at %sftutorplace%.

Stupendous! Those round buttons at the bottom of the screen allow you to switch between Messages, Factory Status, and Inventory windows.

Let's take a look at your inventory now....
You see the sacks of %sugar% that you just purchased, yes? We'll deal with sourcing Cacao later. To get you started, I will give you 75 sacks of %cacao% from my personal holdings...

You should now see the %cacao% in your Inventory.

OK. You have a recipe. You have the ingredients. So let's make some chocolates!

Go see %sffactorykeep% at %sffactory%. He's a bit hard of hearing from years next to the concher, but no one knows chocolate-making like ole' Harry. Come see me again once you've made at least 6 cases of %basebars%.
What's that, boss? You need at least 6 cases of %basebars%? Go on inside and click %minigame% You'll make cases, sure, but also set ongoing efficiency for our machines.
What's that? Oh yes, you need to make those 6 cases of %basebars%. Click %minigame% to give it a go.
Click %minigame% and make at least 6 cases of %basebars%.

Remember, as long as you keep on top of ingredients, we'll keep making chocolates each week at the rate you just established.

Now head back and see %sftutor% at %sftutorplace%.
Go back and speak with %sftutor% at %sftutorplace%.

Excellent! You've made your first chocolates!

Let's take look at your inventory...

You should see the cases of chocolates you just made, as well as whatever ingredients you have left. Sugar, should you need more, is easy to find. %cacao%, however, only grow near the Equator. Here is some money for a trip. Click on the Map, and then travel to %merida%, Mexico. Buy 100 sacks of %cacao% at the %mermarket%. Bon Voyage!

Oh yes - one more thing I almost forgot. Keep in mind that while you travel, as long as you have the needed ingredients, your factories will be making chocolates (and, of course, using ingredients) at the weekly rate you established...
Travel to %merida% and visit %mermarket% to purchase 100 sacks of %cacao%.
Have you purchased the %cacao%? Our factory is running low. %cacao% can be purchased in %merida%.
Greetings, <player>, and welcome to %mermarket%. %sftutor% sent you down for %cacao%? How is that sweet, sweet woman? She truly is one of a kind...
You need to purchase 100 sacks of %cacao%.
Thank you for your business. I will send the goods you have purchased to %sffactory% immediately. Before you head back yourself, go next door to %merplaza% and see %merplazakeep%...

I come across Baumeister recipes from time to time. I have one right here, in fact, for %darkbars%. I tell you what: This first one will be my gift to you. Now you head on back to %sftutor%. Have a safe trip.
Go back to %sanfrancisco% and find %sftutor% at %sftutorplace%.

Excellent work! I see that you have acquired a new recipe, for %darkbars%. Make sure that you have the ingredients you need to make them. Then visit %sffactory%, click "%reconfigure%" and choose %darkbars%. Come back and see me when you've produced at least 8 cases....
Change recipe at %sffactory% to %darkbars%. Produce 8 cases. Bring them to %sftutor%.

Awesome! Take a look at the Factory Status window below. Operational factories appear with steaming smoke stacks. Stalled factories appear with a flashing exclamation point - this means you are probably out of a required ingredient. Silhouetted factories indicate factories you have yet to acquire...
Use the round buttons at the bottom of the screen to switch between Messages, Factory Status and Inventory views.

Now, I want you to go to %newyork%. I'll give you some cash for the trip. Call on %nysalooner% - you can usually find him at %nysaloon%. He has one of the world's biggest sweet tooths, and will pay handsomely for quality %darkbars%.
A little birdie told me that you may be bringing me some %darkbars%? I have a craving!

%darkbars% from %sanfrancisco%? I haven't had chocolates this good since Evangeline was making them herself! I'll take 8 cases off your hands - here is $2000. And, please, do me a favor. Tell Evangeline that I say: "Hat's Off!"
Shouldn't you be getting back to %sanfrancisco%?

"Hat's Off?" %nysalooner% said that? Listen, <player>. You are a quick study. You now know how to travel, find recipes, source ingredients, manufacture and sell quality chocolates. I think you are ready to truly help me with my plan. Let me explain:

Most of my family's recipes, I am afraid, have been scattered across the globe - the result of my younger sister Rowena's mismanagement of Baumeister Confections. If you can build a new empire with our recipes, I will be more than pleased. Here's a bit of money to get you going, and...

You are now a %rank_1%! Work your way up the ranks by collecting our scattered recipes and growing your business. Travel the world; people you encounter may offer quests for you to complete. I, too, may have some things for you to do now and again. Finally, let's work on a name and sign for your company...

A self-starter? I like your moxie, <player>! You will start off as a Novice. Here's some cash and a few recipes to get you going. Your job is to help restore honor to my family's recipes, which you collect throughout the world. Now, let's customize a sign and name your company - this will appear here in %sanfrancisco%, on your first factory....
I do indeed have friends in the chocolate world. Stop by often - you never know when I'll have some news for you...
Are you not in the middle of a quest? Review the white to-do text below if you're not sure what to do next...
Hello there, <player>. I'd be surprised if Evangeline didn't have something for you to be working on just now. Perhaps you should check in with her over at %sftutorplace%....

Salutations, <player>. You are making quite a name for yourself out there. If you are interested in changing your company's signage, remember that you may click on the sign at any of your factories to do so....
I see you've taken over %nyfactory%, <player>. I know my Uncle Hieronymus would have been proud of what you're doing, and I wish you good fortune as you continue to expand your chocolate empire...

Hello there, friend. I happen to have a special ticket here - this will get you passage free of charge on your next trip to any open port you desire. Would you like to take this off my hands for $200?
Well, are you not <player>? I am %villain%, husband of %sydshopkeep%, who is the older sister of %sftutor%. We've been hearing about your efforts to collect our recipes.
Beware, <player>! Baumeister Confections will not sit idly by and let you get away with this! The honor of my wife's name is at stake!
Ah-ha. We meet again, <player>! I told you that we would meet again. And, I warned you not to cross %villain%!
Did you forget about %villain%, <player>? No one forgets %villain%! I hope you've been careful with your ingredients. I wouldn't want anything bad to happen to them...
What have you done, <player>? You have destroyed me! Everything was just fine until you started meddling in Baumeister affairs!
Everything was going according to my plan - until you came along!
If you're looking for something to do, you might check in with %sftutor% in %sanfrancisco%. She's often got something or other up her sleeve...

Greetings, <player>. I am engaged to Evangeline's brother Deiter. We own a shop in Istanbul, and I travel the globe, sourcing chocolates for our shop. If I were to hand you the recipe for %cashewbars%, would you be willing to make 18 cases for us? If you agree, I will look for you in 6 weeks to claim the chocolates...
Make 18 cases of %cashewbars% for %quester%, who will find you in your travels.
Deiter and I are anxious to receive the 18 cases of %cashewbars% you promised us. I'll find you again soon...
Thank you so much, <player>. Here is $3000 for your efforts. And, I do hope that the %cashewbars% recipe serves you well. I'm sure we'll be seeing each other again soon...
Greetings, friend. Would you be so kind as to deliver some papers for me to %merplazakeep% in %merida%? I'd be much obliged.
Do you not have something to deliver to %merplazakeep%?
You have papers from %hench2%? That scoundrel is no friend of mine! I would stay away from that type if I were you, my friend...
All right, <player>. If you make your way down to %trinidad%, be sure to visit my brother, %trinparkkeep%. He may just have some of our old family recipes in his possession...
Visit %trinparkkeep% in %trinidad% to inquire after a family recipe.

Welcome, my friend. I try to stay out of things between Evangeline and Rowena. I do have our recipe for %lemonbars% - you can find %lemon% here at the %trinmarket%. I tell you what - I'll give you the recipe, if you promise to bring me your first 12 cases of %lemonbars%. I intend to pay you well for the chocolates. Deal?
I thought we had an understanding? I gave you a cherished recipe, where are my %lemonbars%?
Welcome back, <player>. Have you got my %lemonbars%? Splendid! Let me taste...ah, these remind me of my grandfather's kitchen. Here is $4500 for the 12 cases I asked for. Thank you!
I heard a rumor that %rioforester% has one of our recipes, I believe for %coffeebars%. Last I heard, she was seeking passage south from Merida...
Head south and try to find %rioforester%.
Are you looking for %rioforester%? Last I heard she was down south, and I do mean way down south...
Yes, indeed. I do have a fantastic Baumeister recipe for %coffeebars% - I came by it honestly. Would you like to buy it from me? For a mere $1000, it can be yours.
Have you bought the recipe for %coffeebars% yet?
A pleasure doing business with you. May the recipe serve your business well.

Hello, <player>. If you're heading that way, would you mind taking these 50 cases of %basebars% to my dear friend %merruinskeep%? You can find him at %merruins% in %merida%. Don't worry, %merruinskeep% will pay you well for your trouble.
Do you not have a special delivery for me from %qsalooner%?

Hello, <player>. I had word from %qsalooner% that you might be arriving. These cases of %basebars% that you bring, they are my absolute favorites. Here is $1500 for your troubles. Listen, you're doing the right thing. I've met %sydshopkeep%; she is not a kind woman.

Oh, I envy you, <player>. I wasn't always tied to this shop. I once wandered the world myself, you know. In fact, the love of my life is still out there, traveling the globe. Her name is %quester3% - do you think you could carry a letter with you, and if you run into her on your travels, deliver it on my behalf? I'd be much obliged...
A letter from %trinsaloonkeep%? Oh, if it weren't for my father, I'd go to him right now. Would you take a return letter back to him for me? It would mean the world to me...

Oh my word - a letter from %quester3%! Am I really still in her thoughts? How can I ever repay you for this most kind favor? Listen - next time you're in %newyork%, visit the %nylibrary%, and tell %nylibrarian% that I sent you.
When next in New York, visit %nylibrary% and mention %trinsaloonkeep%.

I understand you've got the recipe for %quitodarkbars%? I happen to be a rather large fan of the same. Would you be willing to accept an order for, let's say, 24 cases? I will pay you $10,000 - a higher price, I guarantee, than you would find in any Chocolate Shop.
I have a pile of cash here for you. All I need are those 24 cases of %quitodarkbars%...
Wonderful - you've got the chocolates I ordered! Here, as promised, is your payment of $10,000.

I absolutely love %darkbars%. I have a proposal for you. If you bring me 35 cases, I will pay you $3000, and also hand over the recipe for %quitodarkbars% - this is a Baumeister recipe that you won't find anywhere else on this earth. What do you say?
I have that special recipe for you, but only after you've brought me those 35 cases of %darkbars%.

Wonderful - you've brought me the %darkbars%. I'll take 35 cases for $3000. And, as promised, I'll hand over the recipe for %quitodarkbars%. These exclusive bars are expensive to manufacture, but they command very high prices all over the world. I think you'll do well with these, my friend.
You are looking for recipes, my friend? I've got one here that will serve you well. I could see my way to parting with it for, say, $1100. What do you say?
Splendid. Here, then, is the recipe for %milkbars%. From what I've been told, these chocolates command a pretty penny over in Europe.

Word on the high seas is that you have a fantastic recipe for %coffeebars%, <player>. I'll tell you what. I'll look for you 4 weeks from now. If you have 20 cases of %coffeebars% for me, I'll take them from you, and trade you my coveted recipe for %mintbars%. What do you say?
Have 20 cases of %coffeebars% ready to trade with %tipster%.
I've got that recipe for %mintbars% right here - I'll gladly trade it for those 20 cases of %coffeebars% we discussed.
Have you got those 20 cases of %coffeebars%? Excellent - here is the recipe I promised you in return. Enjoy!

%trinfarm% is the only place on earth where you can buy %trinidad_cacao% - used in some very fine chocolates that demand a pretty penny out there. I happen to have just such a recipe in my possession, for %trindarkbars%, which I would be willing to sell you for $1000. Would you like to buy it?
Here, then, is the recipe - use it wisely. As I said, these exclusive varietal bars command high prices the world over.

You've got the recipe for %lemonbars%, have you not? I have a 1st cousin, her name is %qgalaguide%. If you take 15 cases of %lemonbars% to her at %galapagos%, off the coast of %quito%, she might just be able to find one of our family recipes for you...
I had an inkling someone was going to be bringing me some delicious %lemonbars%...

You have %lemonbars% for me? Oh, these bring me back. You really do know how to make good chocolates, <player>. Listen, here is one of the most cherished Baumeister recipes - for %almondbars%. In your hands, I'm sure they will be most wonderful...

Ah, <player>, I've been wondering when we might see you again. I have a craving for %milkbars%. If I were to put in an order now for 28 cases, and you were deliver them to me here, I would pay you handsomely, certainly better than any shop. Will you accept my offer?
You remember %nysalooner%, do you not? He's to be found at %nysaloon% in %newyork%.
I believe we had a deal, did we not? I have the funds right here, I'll just need you to deliver those %milkbars%.
My %milkbars%! How wonderful. I am a man of my word, <player>. Here is $7500 for the 28 cases.

I have a tip for you, <player>. Have you met %qsalooner%, in %quito%? She tends bar at the %qsaloon%, and happens to be a chocolate fanatic. If you were to arrive with 25 cases of your %darkbars% in hand, you might be able to talk Helen into making a very worthwhile trade. Interested?
I could swear my friend in Rio said that you might be showing up with some cases of chocolates to trade?
25 cases of %darkbars% sure do tickle my fancy. And I sure do appreciate the effort. I will not only pay you $5000, but also hand over the Baumeister recipe for %whitebars%. Use it well...

I am Evangeline's first cousin - and I do love good chocolates. Word has been getting around about your %cashewbars%, <player>. Might you be willing to take an order for me? I'll pay you $5000 for 10 cases, which will more than cover your expenses. Will you accept this order?
How are those 10 cases of %cashewbars% I ordered coming together?
I understand that %qgalaguide% in %quito% is expecting the 10 cases of %cashewbars% she ordered from you some weeks back - I wouldn't recommend making her wait much longer...
Wonderful - you've got the chocolates I ordered! Here, as promised, is your payment of $5,000.

Hello again, <player>. Those %darkbars% of yours sure hit the spot - although I've already run through my supply. I would like to place an order for some more. For 30 additional cases of your %darkbars% I will pay you $8,500 - a tidy sum indeed. Can I count on you to bring me your next 30 cases?
Certainly you remember my order for %darkbars%? 30 cases for $8,500, if memory serves?
Ah, <player>, I was recently in %newyork% and %nysalooner% asked me to pass along a message to you - he's anxious to receive the 30 cases of %darkbars% that he ordered.
Wonderful - you've got the chocolates I ordered! Here, as promised, is your payment of $8,500.

Listen, <player>. Owning a Chocolate Shop or two would be a great way for you to expand your operations. From what I've been told, the shop in %merida% might be coming available soon. Next time you're in Merida, do yourself a favor. Stop by and say hello to %mershopkeep%.
Remember to drop by %mershop% in %merida% at some point.

Hello there, <player>. I am happy to welcome a friend of Evangeline's to my shop. I have heard good things about your creations. Please, step inside - I'd be happy to buy some of your wares, and I hope to see more of you in the future.
Welcome back, <player>, it is good to see you again....
I have a favor to ask of you. My good friend, %nylibrarian%, works at the Library in %newyork%. Would you be willing to deliver 25 cases of %basebars% to him for me?
Did my friend %mershopkeep% not send some %basebars% for me?
How lovely! %basebars% from my friend %mershopkeep%! Thank you so much, <player>.
Won't you please pass along my very best the next time you see her?
Hello again, <player>. You have met my friend, %nylibrarian%, and delivered the bars? Thank you so much. I truly appreciate it.

To show you my thanks, I would like to make you a gift. I want you to have the recipe for %xdarkbars%. You will notice that these require 4 ingredients to produce. Come back and see me when you've got some made - I may have another quest for you.
Once you've got some %xdarkbars% produced, bring a sample to %mershopkeep% in %merida%.

%mershopkeep% gave you the recipe for %xdarkbars%, did she not? Did she not mention that she would like to sample the same? If you will take a case to %merruinskeep% in %merida%, he'll tell you what to do.
You received the recipe for %xdarkbars% from %mershopkeep%, did you not? Once you've got some cases made, come see me again, and I'll tell you what needs to be done.
Greetings, <player>. Just pop over to %mershop% with your %xdarkbars% in hand. She'll tell you what to do next...

You are very dependable, <player>, and I appreciate that. I see you have produced some %xdarkbars%. So, here's a tip. Make 40 cases. Go to %riodejaneiro%, and visit a famous beach there. There you will find %riocopakeep%, who will pay quite well for those %xdarkbars% - of that you have my word.
I would surely pay, and quite handsomely, for 40 cases of %xdarkbars%.
You have the 40 cases of %xdarkbars% I ordered from %mershopkeep%? Wonderful. As I promised Frida, I will pay you well for these - here is $5000. Let me tell you a story about these bars.....

These delightful concoctions were invented by Marten Baumeister himself. He passed the recipe down to his son, Hieronymus, who created Baumeister Confections. That's right, the father of Evangeline and Rowena. %mershopkeep% must think very highly of your chocolate-making skills. You should call on her again soon.
%mershopkeep% in %merida% is eager to have a word with you. I suggest that you visit her right away, and don't accept another quest until you've done so...

Once again, welcome. I have had word from %riodejaneiro% - your %xdarkbars% were quite the hit. Listen, my landlord is looking for someone to take ownership of this shop. Would you be interested in purchasing it for $7500? I'll pay you premium prices for all of your wares, and keep you informed of trends around here. What do you say?
I am still interested in selling you my shop.
Wonderful! It is my honor to become your partner. As a token of my gratitude, I am also going to hand over the recipe for %almond_darkbars% which I have in my possession.
Welcome to your shop, <player>. It is always a pleasure to see you again...
So, <player>. How would you like to win at dice? I've got a vial of special powder here - keep this with you, and you are certain to win at dice. I'll sell it to you for $2000. What do you say?
Special Dice Powder? Wow, there really is one born every minute! Let's see what else I have around here that I might be able to sell you...
For just $500, I'll sell you this magic amulet. With this in your possession, you are sure to be successful the next 3 times you Haggle with a merchant. Want to give it a try?
It really works - try it and you will see!

Listen, friend. There are great opportunities for a budding Chocolatier in Europe and Africa. The way to open up those ports is to successfully complete quests so that you can move up the ranks. Once you're an %rank_2%, you will be able to visit places like %london% and %accra%, where you can meet new people, uncover more recipes, and continue to expand your chocolate empire!

You simply must make your way to Asia; some of the key characters of the Baumeister saga are only to be encountered in cities over there. Once you've achieved the rank of %rank_3%, several of these ports will be available to you. Good luck!

You are doing very well, <player>. In order to achieve the rank of %rank_2%, you'll need to have at least 5 recipes for bars on hand. Make sure that you meet with people as you travel around; you never know who's willing to share a recipe or two, although often for a price. Good luck!
Greetings, <player>. %sftutor% is anxious to speak with you. Be sure to visit with her as soon as you can find your way to %sanfrancisco%.
%sftutor% has been wondering when you're planning to pay her a visit in %sanfrancisco%. It appears she has some important news for you, <player>....

Thank you for stopping by, <player>. I am very pleased with your progress. Your business is growing nicely, and you are doing well by my family's recipes. Your rank is now %rank_2%. More of the world is open for you to explore - more characters to meet, more ingredients and recipes to discover...

I also have some recipes that I have been saving for you for this occasion. Some of these are for Squares. You will need to outfit each of your factories with additional equipment to be able to produce Squares, but they will earn a higher profit margin in shops. Keep making me proud!
Be sure to mention %trinsaloonkeep% to %nylibrarian% in %newyork% when you're not working on another quest.

So, %trinsaloonkeep% told you to look me up? Well, you must have done something very special for him - he is a dear friend, and doesn't give my name out lightly. Let me see if I might be able to find something here for you - give me one minute...
OK - I found a good one. This is a recipe for %coffee_darkbars%. I hope the recipe brings you great fortune. Be well, and do stay in touch.
Many have loved %sftutor%, this is true. None, though, could best her first and only true love. Man named %hkpeakkeep%. You'll find him in %hongkong% these days. Must be quite a fellow....
We see all types of people here at the %sfsaloon%. You never know who you're gonna run into in saloons. Most folks are decent types, all right, but I sure can't say that for all of 'em.
I guess I have given up on Evangeline, in the same way that she seems to have given up on her dreams. Perhaps through you, <player>, she can make peace with her demons...

You may have wondered where I came by a Baumeister recipe? Let's just say that this place is frequented by people who come by things in rather unconventional ways. These people accumulate debts, and these debts must be repaid...
From what I've been told, Baumeister Confections once owned factories all over the world. Hard to believe, given what comes out of Sydney these days...
We're not particular, here at the market. But it sure is nice to sell ingredients to someone who knows how to turn them into something delicious. Welcome...

Sure, you can find ordinary %cacao% at many markets, but if your recipe calls for a specific variety of beans, you need to deal directly with the growers at their farms. I use new methods to grow and harvest only the finest beans here.

Look, chocolate is in my blood. I am the fourth daughter of Marten Baumeister Jr., who was a brother to Hieronymus Baumeister himself. I always worried about what would happen after Hieronymus died, but never would I have predicted it to get as bad as it has between my cousins.

I've been to Bavaria, and seen the shops where the Baumeister's grandfather first hawked his wares. He would never in his wildest dreams have imagined the heights - and lows - to which his recipes have brought that family...
%sftutor% blames me for something over which I had no control. Perhaps she will believe me some day...
My fiance, Deiter Baumeister, tries to stay out of things between his sisters, but I know what's what with those two. And believe me, you're on the right side...
I am sure glad to know that Evangeline has found someone she can trust to help with her situation. I know things will work out someday...
Deiter Baumeister, who is to be my husband, would never say so, but believe me, he appreciates all that you are doing for his sister.

I am the eldest daughter of Marten Baumeister, Jr. - 1st cousin to the Baumeister Confections clan. I am very pleased with what you are doing with their recipes, and wish you nothing but success in your efforts.
Shady characters have been known to lurk here at the beach. Be on guard!

Hello, traveler. Listen, if you're interested. There's a bloke in %london%, tends bar in town there, name's %ukpubkeep%. Supposed to have a fantastic recipe for %caramel_squares%. Word is he might be willing to sell it to you for $1000. Shall I put in a word for you?
Purchase the recipe for %caramel_squares% for $1000 in %london%.
I've got the recipe right here. All I need is my $1000.
Greetings, <player>. I have just come from London, where %ukpubkeep% anxiously awaits your arrival. I wouldn't tally much longer, were I in your shoes....
Tally-oh! If you'll be so kind to hand over the $1000, I've got the recipe for %caramel_squares% right here. I hope it brings you good fortune.

Hello, <player>. You're making quite a name for yourself out there in the world of chocolates. I have a craving for %hazelnut_milk_sq%, and I also happen to be in possession of the Baumeister recipe for the same. I've been looking for the right Chocolatier to trust with this. Are you interested?
OK. Here is the recipe - I'll be looking for these in my local chocolate Shop soon....

Ah, <player>, any friend of %sftutor%'s is a friend of mine. I have in my possession some very special recipes - for %cinnamon_squares% and %milk_van_squares%. If I hand them over to you now, might you do me a favor, and bring 30 cases of each to %sftutor%?
Hello, <player>. %mahashopkeep% said you might be bringing me a special surprise?
Bring 30 cases of %cinnamon_squares% and 30 cases of %milk_van_squares% to %sftutor%.
%sftutor% is looking forward to receiving 30 cases of %cinnamon_squares% and 30 cases of %milk_van_squares% in %sanfrancisco%.
I haven't tasted Squares like this in so long! What a delight! I'm going to keep 30 cases of both your %cinnamon_squares% and %milk_van_squares% for my own stock - here is $30,000 for the chocolates.
You must call on my brother again in %trinidad%. Bring him some of those delightful %cinnamon_squares% - he just might be able to uncover another recipe or two...
Bring a case of %cinnamon_squares% to Evangeline's brother in %trinidad%.
Is it true that you have learned how to make %cinnamon_squares%? I haven't tasted them in years...

Oh my goodness - %cinnamon_squares%. These are absolutely delightful. I will savor this case, and in return, hand over all the Squares recipes I have on hand. My sister must really think the world of you...

You know how to make %coffee_squares%, don't you? Here's a tip. Go see %riocopakeep%. You'll find him in a Portuguese-speaking country in South America. Bring him 40 cases of %coffee_squares%, and tell him I told you to look him up.
Deliver 40 cases of %coffee_squares% to %riocopakeep% somewhere in South America.
You are looking for %riocopakeep%, correct? You'll find him on the east coast of South America...
Have you those %coffee_squares% I was promised?

Well, if these aren't the tastiest %coffee_squares% I've had in an age, my name is not %riocopakeep%. Here is $10,000 for 40 cases, and I'll throw in a recipe for %almond_van_squares%. Just don't tell anyone where you got it...
Hello, <player>. %ukpalacekeep% would like to place an order for an event being hosted by the Queen of England. Be sure to check in with him in %london% if you are looking for something to do.

Thank you for dropping by, <player>. The Queen is planning a large gathering, and would like to commission you to produce 85 cases of %cherry_van_squares% for the affair. We will pay you $100,000 for the chocolates, and allow you to keep the recipe as well. Does this sound acceptable to you?
Produce 85 cases of %cherry_van_squares% for the Queen of England's event.
The Queen is beginning to wonder about her chocolates...
Our gathering approaches, and we anxiously await the arrival of those 85 cases of %cherry_van_squares% that we commissioned you to produce...
Excellent, you have brought the chocolates. Here is the $100,000 I promised you in exchange for the goods. And I hope the recipe brings you much success.

I was recently in %accra%. Wonderful place. There's a market keeper there, man by the name of %accramarketkeep%. I think you'll find it to be worth your while to pay him a visit when you're ready for a quest.

Greetings, friend. I have heard of your connection with the good side of the Baumeister clan. Here's a tip. You can find wonderful %hazelnuts% here at my market. Use them to make %hazelnut_squares%, and once you've got 25 cases produced, call on %trinsaloonkeep% in %trinidad%.
I was under the impression, and correct me if I'm wrong, that you might be arriving with several cases of something sweet in hand.....
Yum! I can almost taste %accra% in these delightful Squares. Here is $8500. More importantly, take this note to %nyfactorykeep% at %nyfactory%.
Salutations, <player>. %trinsaloonkeep% m'a demandé de garder un œil sur vous.

Écoutez, je sais que %qshop% pourrait être mis en vente à un bon prix, moins de 40 000 $. Si vous deviez apporter une douzaine de caisses de votre %cashew_dark_sq% à %qsalooner%, elle pourra vous donner les détails...
Mon Dieu, qu'est-ce que je donnerais pour une douzaine de caisses de %cashew_dark_sq%...

Merci beaucoup pour ces %cashew_dark_sq% exquis. Nous sommes très heureux ici à %quito% de ce que vous faites, et j'ai une recette de Baumeister à partager.
De plus, si vous pouvez réunir 25 000 $ et vous diriger vers %qshop% maintenant, je pense que vous pourriez pouvoir s'approprier la boutique...
Avoir 25 000 $ sous la main et aller voir %qshopkeep% pour acquérir la boutique à %quito%.

Salutations, <player>. Je comprends que vous pourriez être intéressé par l'acquisition de cette boutique ? Pour 25 000 $, il peut être le vôtre. Nous achèterons toujours vos marchandises aux prix les plus élevés et vous tiendrons au courant des tendances locales. Que dis-tu?
Mon offre tient toujours - vous devez trouver 25 000 $.
Formidable! Que notre partenariat soit long et prospère pour nous deux !

And, to show you my appreciation, I am going to give my most valued recipe, for %colodarkbars%. You will need to eventually make your way to %colombo% in order to get the ingredients you need to make these, but you will have the recipe once you do.

Salutations, <player>. J'ai entendu des choses merveilleuses sur vos concoctions. J'ai en ma possession une recette alléchante de %cherry_squares%. Si je vous le donne maintenant, allez-vous m'en préparer 20 caisses ? Je vous retrouverai lors de vos déplacements pour récupérer les chocolats. Avons-nous un accord?
Préparez 20 caisses de %cherry_squares% pour %talker%, qui vous retrouvera dans vos voyages.
J'espère que vous tiendrez parole et que vous me préparerez ces 20 caisses de %cherry_squares% sur lesquelles nous nous sommes mis d'accord ?
Ah, nous y voilà, vous avez mes chocolats. Merci beaucoup et j'espère sincèrement que vous pourrez utiliser la recette des %cherry_squares% dans vos efforts pour développer votre empire du chocolat !

Psst. Écoutez, <player>, si vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, et croyez-moi, vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, vous aurez besoin d'un visa. Gardez un œil ouvert pour %quester5%. Il est quelque part par ici, et il a souvent des choses intéressantes à vendre.

Psst. Écoutez, <player>, si vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, et croyez-moi, vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, vous aurez besoin d'un visa. Gardez un œil ouvert pour %quester5%. Il est quelque part par ici, et il a souvent des choses intéressantes à vendre.

Psst. Écoutez, <player>, si vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, et croyez-moi, vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, vous aurez besoin d'un visa. Gardez un œil ouvert pour %quester5%. Il est quelque part par ici, et il a souvent des choses intéressantes à vendre.

Psst. Écoutez, <player>, si vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, et croyez-moi, vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, vous aurez besoin d'un visa. Gardez un œil ouvert pour %quester5%. Il est quelque part par ici, et il a souvent des choses intéressantes à vendre.

Psst. Écoutez, <player>, si vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, et croyez-moi, vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, vous aurez besoin d'un visa. Gardez un œil ouvert pour %quester5%. Il est quelque part par ici, et il a souvent des choses intéressantes à vendre.

Psst. Écoutez, <player>, si vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, et croyez-moi, vous voulez vous rendre à Istanbul, vous aurez besoin d'un visa. Gardez un œil ouvert pour %quester5%. Il est quelque part par ici, et il a souvent des choses intéressantes à vendre.

Il se trouve que j'ai obtenu un visa supplémentaire pour voyager à Istanbul. Je comprends qu'il y a tout un tas de recettes à trouver sur %istkikulesi%. Quoi qu'il en soit, êtes-vous intéressé à m'enlever ça des mains pour, disons, 5000 $ ?
Excellent. Assurez-vous de visiter %isttowerkeep% lorsque vous vous y rendrez. Dis-lui que je t'envoie.

Vous avez été envoyé par %quester5% ? Dans ce cas, bienvenue sur %istkikulesi%. Je suis en effet en possession d'un livre de recettes très ancien et très rare. Certaines pages sont fanées, mais il y a 2 ou 3 recettes ici que je pense que vous pourrez utiliser. Souhaitez-vous l'acheter pour, disons, 9500 $?

Bonne journée à vous, <player>. Je suis tellement heureux de voir les recettes Baumeister être utilisées à bon escient. Sans rien enlever à Rowena, mais la qualité n'avait tout simplement pas été à la hauteur. Bien sûr, je me souviens avoir goûté ma première infusion Baumeister quand j'étais tout petit.
S'il vous arrive de rencontrer un %hench2% lors de vos voyages - et croyez-moi, c'est un type difficile à manquer - vous feriez mieux de vous méfier, mon ami.

Je travaille à cet endroit depuis très longtemps. Ce n'est que mon avis, mais je n'ai jamais eu beaucoup de problèmes avec la femme, Rowena. Le mari, par contre - %villain% - c'est une toute autre histoire...

Quand tu es là depuis aussi longtemps que moi, <player>, tu deviens un assez bon juge de caractère. Je crois vraiment que si %villain% n'était jamais entré en scène, Baumeister Confections serait en plein essor à ce jour...
Vous cherchez des recettes, n'est-ce pas? Je n'ai rien pour l'instant, mais j'en croise de temps en temps...

Je suis bien un Baumeister - un cousin en tout cas - mais j'essaie d'éviter cette situation, du moins autant que je peux. Mon mari et moi essayons simplement de gagner décemment notre vie en faisant ce que nous aimons - fournir des chocolats.
Bien que je n'aie jamais quitté l'île de Madagascar, j'ai beaucoup lu et je me tiens au courant de ce qui se passe là-bas. Je sais que ce que vous faites est honorable - ne vous découragez pas !
Ai-je entendu parler de %villain% ? Bien sûr! Son argent est aussi bon que celui de n'importe qui d'autre, en ce qui me concerne. Avez-vous besoin d'ingrédients, mon ami?

Oh, mes sœurs, comme j'aimerais qu'elles résolvent simplement leurs différends. Pour ma part, j'achèterai des chocolats de qualité à qui me les vendra au juste prix. Regarde ce que je suis prêt à payer...

Vous avez peut-être rencontré mon fiancé, %quester% ? Elle est merveilleuse, n'est-ce pas ? J'en ai aimé beaucoup dans ma journée, mais aucune ne se compare à elle. Et quelle dent sucrée ! Sarah pense que Grimaldo est responsable des problèmes de notre famille, mais je n'en suis pas si sûr...

J'ai un message pour vous, <player>. La reine d'Angleterre organise un événement et %ukpalacekeep% aimerait passer une commande pour certaines de vos confections. Assurez-vous de lui rendre visite la prochaine fois que vous irez à %london%.
Vous ne savez jamais qui vous pourriez croiser ici au Bull's Head Pub, n'est-ce pas ?
Revenez, Chocolatier. La reine aime les sucreries et pourrait simplement avoir envie de goûter à vos marchandises. Cheerio.
Visitez %ukpalacekeep% à %london% pour vous renseigner sur une commande de chocolats pour l'événement Queen's.
Allez à %sanfrancisco% et parlez avec %sftutor%. Elle a un message important pour vous...

Je suis ravi que vous ayez reçu mon message, <player>. Vous vous débrouillez merveilleusement bien. Votre rang est maintenant %rank_3%. Vous êtes libre d'explorer plus de ports et de vous lancer dans de nouvelles aventures. J'ai aussi une recette pour vous. Et assurez-vous de visiter %nylibrarian%. Dites-lui que j'ai dit : "Lâchez le chien." Il comprendra ce que je veux dire...
Lorsque vous arriverez à %newyork%, n'oubliez pas de dire à %nylibrarian% qu'Evangeline dit de "lâcher le chien"
Mon cousin ne vous a-t-il pas donné un message spécial pour %nylibrarian% ? Pourriez-vous envisager de faire passer le message maintenant ?
Allez dire à %nylibrarian% à %newyork% qu'Evangeline dit de "lâcher le chien".
"Lâcher le chien ?" %sftutor% dit que? Wow, tu dois être un sacré chocolatier, mon ami. Attends ici juste un instant, laisse-moi te chercher quelque chose....

Ce que je vous donne maintenant est une recette Baumeister du coffre-fort. Ceci est pour une infusion - Baumeister a inventé cette méthode de confection de confiseries il y a de nombreuses lunes. La majoration sur ces types de confections est en effet assez élevée. Bonne chance à vous, <player>. Et ne soyez pas un étranger...

Écoute, je vais à Hawaï. Je serai de retour dans environ 3 semaines. Il se trouve que je connais un type qui vend une recette de %coffee_infusion%. Ces bonbons attirent beaucoup l'attention partout. Quoi qu'il en soit, si vous êtes prêt à me payer 2750 $ la prochaine fois que nous nous croiserons, je serais heureux de le récupérer pour vous. Que dis-tu?
Achetez la recette de %coffee_infusion% pour 2750 $ auprès de %quester5%.
Je suis toujours en route pour Hawaï. Avez-vous les 2750 $ ensemble?
Vous avez les 2750 $ ? Génial - voici la recette de %coffee_infusion%. Au plaisir de faire affaire avec vous, <joueur>, et j'espère vous revoir bientôt.

Salutations et bienvenue à %colmosque%. Il se trouve que j'ai en ma possession 3 recettes Baumeister d'Infusions. Je vous dis quoi, si je vous en donne 2, vous me promettez de me rapporter un échantillon de chacun ? Vous faites cela, et je vous remettrai la 3e recette. Avons-nous un accord?
Avez-vous mes bonbons? J'ai l'autre recette toute prête pour vous...
Délicieuse! Tu es vraiment un chocolatier doué. Voici la recette restante - pour %maha_cherry_infusion%.

Avez-vous rencontré %colsalooner% à %colsaloon% ? Elle est méchante - c'est vrai. Mais je sais qu'elle a un faible pour %maha_cherry_infusion%. Si vous vous présentiez avec, disons, 10 caisses, elle pourrait avoir une surprise pour vous...
Échangez 10 caisses de %maha_cherry_infusion% contre la surprise de %colsalooner% à %colombo%.
Qu'est-ce que c'est? Si vous n'avez pas 10 caisses de %maha_cherry_infusion% à échanger, alors perdez-vous !

Que voulez-vous ?

Oh, je vois que vous avez 10 caisses de %maha_cherry_infusion% pour moi. Très bien alors. Voici une recette en échange. Bonne route.

J'ai entendu parler de vous, <player>. Surtout de bonnes choses aussi. Quand j'étais en Afrique, j'ai rencontré un homme très généreux du nom de %accralighthousekeep%. Si vous deviez arriver avec mes bonnes nouvelles ainsi que 2 douzaines de caisses de %colodarkbars%, je pense qu'il pourrait y avoir une belle récompense pour vous. Intéressé?
Apportez 2 douzaines de caisses de %colodarkbars% à %accralighthousekeep% en Afrique de l'Ouest.
J'ai une recette fantastique et précieuse dont je suis prêt à me séparer. Travaillez-vous sur des chocolats pour moi ?

Hum - absolument délicieux. Pour ces 24 caisses, je vais vous donner 5000$ et la recette de %maha_mint_raspberry_infusion%. Le Cacao peut être acheté de l'autre côté de l'Afrique. J'espère que les chocolats serviront bien votre entreprise.

Avez-vous croisé %merruinskeep% lors de vos voyages ? L'homme est un vrai passionné d'histoire, et un vrai amateur de chocolat. Il se trouve que je sais qu'il ne peut pas résister à %milk_choc_infusion%. Présentez-vous avec 40 caisses, et il y aura peut-être une recette dans l'offre pour vous.
Ce n'est pas un mensonge, j'ai envie de 40 caisses de %milk_choc_infusion%.
Vous devriez chercher %merruinskeep% à %merida%, une fois que vous avez ses chocolats en main.

40 caisses d'un de mes chocolats préférés ! Je vous suis redevable, <player>. Je vous dis ce que. Voici une recette spéciale - c'est pour %sula_macadamia_infusion%. Faites appel à moi à nouveau - je serai certainement intéressé à goûter plus de vos produits, et je pourrai peut-être trouver une autre recette ou deux ici...
N'oubliez pas d'appeler %merruinskeep% à %merida% à l'avenir.
Bienvenue à %sulalands%, <player>. Je suis un homme simple, avec des goûts simples. Auriez-vous la gentillesse de m'apporter 12 caisses de %darkbars% ? Vous serez bien sûr récompensé...
